Description: Maintain up to date GOR (Goods outward Report) and share weekly to Logistics Leader. Review import shipping documents and arrange required import permits / approvals before shipment arrival. (Approvals like: QCD, Metrology, EPC, ICT & MOI)Skills
Skills: Experience: 2-3 years in logistics, Customs clearance & material handling
Computer knowledge: Outlook, Teams, Microsoft 365 (mainly excel & word).
On receipt of Dispatch instructions, prepare delivery documents (delivery note, packing list, COO, Etc.)
